title: Mayura Kundanalu: Exquisite Peacock Stud Earrings with Diamonds
materials: 22K Yellow Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Featuring a central Emerald (Panacha) cabochon
and sparkling Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones of VVS clarity.
features: These striking stud earrings showcase the timeless elegance of South Indian design. A stylized peacock (Mayura) is intricately crafted within a circular frame. The gold openwork design highlights the CZ stones, creating a dazzling effect. Features a screw-back closure for added security.
colors: Dominant Gold with contrasting Green (Emerald) and Red (Ruby) accents. The clear CZ stones add brilliance and enhance the vibrancy of the colored gemstones.
occasions: festive occasions like Sankranthi and Diwali
or as a cherished gift for someone special. Also suitable for modern cocktail parties or everyday wear for a touch of traditional flair.
description: These earrings embody the beauty of traditional South Indian jewelry with a modern sensibility. The peacock motif symbolizes beauty, love, and prosperity. Handcrafted with meticulous detail and featuring high-quality materials, these earrings are designed to be cherished for generations. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting luster and shine.
